<a id="EncodedObjectAsID"></a>

# EncodedObjectAsID

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Holds a reference to an [Object](Object.md)'s instance ID.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Utility class which holds a reference to the internal identifier of an [Object](Object.md) instance, as given by [Object.get_instance_id()](Object.md#Object_method_get_instance_id). This ID can then be used to retrieve the object instance with [@GlobalScope.instance_from_id()](@GlobalScope.md#@GlobalScope_method_instance_from_id).

This class is used internally by the editor inspector and script debugger, but can also be used in plugins to pass and display objects as their IDs.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="EncodedObjectAsID_property_object_id"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **object_id** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#EncodedObjectAsID_property_object_id)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_object_id**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_object_id**\ (\ )

The [Object](Object.md) identifier stored in this **EncodedObjectAsID** instance. The object instance can be retrieved with [@GlobalScope.instance_from_id()](@GlobalScope.md#@GlobalScope_method_instance_from_id).
